ItemDesc: The official currency circulating in Belobog. Can be used to purchase goods in Special Stores.
ItemBGDesc: After a long era of blockades, the Overworld and Underworld denizens of Belobog have developed vastly different standards for currency.\nThe current exchange rate of shield to credits is now 1:<unbreak>50</unbreak>... Speaking of, why are credits still an official currency of Belobog? It seems people have already forgotten the answer to this question.
